name: Olympia, Yamasa: Virtua Pachi-Slot II: Jissen! Bishoujo Kouryakuhou
overview: Olympia Yamasa: Virtua Pachi-Slot II - Jissen! Bishoujo Kouryaku Hou is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of gambling machines with different levels of zoom. The game features a challenge mode, a free mode (just to play the machines) and also a story mode in which the player takes the role of a gambler that goes around the pachinko places of town to win money that he will schange for prizes and he also can find some girls there.
